mapper.select: select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ks.user_id as userId, ks.alert_type as alertType, ks.is_alert as isAlert, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id where ks.skill_id = #{skillID};

select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ks.user_id as userId, ks.alert_type as alertType, ks.is_alert as isAlert, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id where ksr.left_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo} and ksr.right_skill_no <= #{rightSkillNo} and ksr.layer <= #{layer} and ks.user_id = #{userId} order by ksr.left_skill_no;

select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ks.user_id as userId, ks.alert_type as alertType, ks.is_alert as isAlert, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id and ks.user_id = #{userId} where ksr.layer = #{layer} order by ksr.left_skill_no;

select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ks.user_id as userId, ks.alert_type as alertType, ks.is_alert as isAlert, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id where ks.skill_name = #{skillName} and ks.user_id = #{userId} order by ksr.left_skill_no;

select ks.skill_id as skillID, ks.skill_name as skillName, ks.skill_detail as skillDetail, ks.user_id as userId, ks.skill_create as skillCreate, ks.alert_type as alertType, ks.is_alert as isAlert, ksr.layer as layer, ksr.left_skill_no as leftSkillNo, ksr.right_skill_no as rightSkillNo, ksr.skill_level as skillLevel from kt_skill ks LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr on ks.skill_id = ksr.skill_id and ks.user_id = #{userId} where ks.skill_create < #{time} and ks.alert_type < #{alertType} and ks.user_id = #{userId} order by ks.skill_create desc;

select link.*, ks_parent.skill_name as parent_skill_name, ks_child.skill_name as child_skill_name from ( select ksr_parent.skill_id as parent_skill_id, ksr_parent.layer as parent_layer, ksr_parent.skill_level as parent_skill_level, ksr_parent.left_skill_no as parent_left_skill_no, ksr_parent.right_skill_no as parent_right_skill_no, ksr_child.skill_id as child_skill_id, ksr_child.layer as child_layer, ksr_child.skill_level as child_skill_level, ksr_child.left_skill_no as child_left_skill_no, ksr_child.right_skill_no as child_right_skill_no from kt_skill_relation ksr_parent LEFT JOIN kt_skill_relation ksr_child on ((ksr_parent.left_skill_no < ksr_child.left_skill_no)and (ksr_parent.right_skill_no > ksr_child.right_skill_no) and ksr_parent.layer = ksr_child.layer-1) LEFT JOIN kt_skill ks on ksr_child.skill_id = ks.skill_id where ks.skill_id = #{userId} ) link LEFT JOIN kt_skill ks_parent on ks_parent.skill_id=link.parent_skill_id LEFT JOIN kt_skill ks_child on ks_child.skill_id = link.child_skill_id where link.child_skill_id is not null;
mapper.insert: insert into kt_skill (skill_name, skill_detail, skill_create, user_id, alert_type) value(#{skillName}, #{skillDetail}, #{skillCreate}, #{userId}, #{alertType});
insert into kt_skill_relation (left_skill_no, right_skill_no, layer, skill_id, skill_level) value(#{leftSkillNo}, #{rightSkillNo}, #{layer}, #{skillID}, #{skillLevel});
mapper.update: update kt_skill_relation set left_skill_no = left_skill_no+2 where left_skill_no >= #{rightSkillNo}; update kt_skill_relation set right_skill_no = right_skill_no+2 where right_skill_no >= #{rightSkillNo};
mapper.delete: delete from kt_skill where skill_id in (select skill_id from (select skill_id from kt_skill_relation where left_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo} and right_skill_no <= #{rightSkillNo}) as tmp); delete from kt_skill_relation where skill_id in (select skill_id from (select skill_id from kt_skill_relation where left_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo} and right_skill_no <= #{rightSkillNo}) as tmp);
mapper.update: update kt_skill_relation set right_skill_no = right_skill_no-(#{rightSkillNo}-#{leftSkillNo}+1) where right_skill_no >= #{rightSkillNo}; update kt_skill_relation set left_skill_no = left_skill_no-(#{rightSkillNo}-#{leftSkillNo}+1) where left_skill_no >= #{leftSkillNo};
update kt_skill_relation set skill_level = skill_level+1 where skill_id = #{skillID}
update kt_skill_relation set skill_level = skill_level-1 where skill_id = #{skillID}
update kt_skill set skill_name=#{skill.skillName}, skill_detail=#{skill.skillDetail} where skill_id = #{skill.skillID}
update kt_skill set alert_type=#{skill.alertType},is_alert=1 where skill_id = #{skill.skillID}
update kt_skill set is_alert=1 where skill_id = #{skill.skillID}
